description:
Designing an open source robot

A introduction talk about how to make a hobby robot. It will go through the basics of designing a basic DIY autonomous robot.

The talk will give an overview og my BalpBotOne robot project. http://balp.github.io/balpbotone/ What I leavened and how to think about your first hardware design.


Download video: http://videos.fscons.org/fscons/2013/lilla_horsalen_-_2013-11-10_1715_-_designing_an_open_source_robot_-_anders_arnholm_-_24.ogv

title: Anders Arnholm: Designing an open source robot
